name: What Would Have Been
description:
Welcome to my life. Or at least what it would have been like if covid-19 didn't happen. Doesn't that sound nice; no quarantine, no cancelled events, no one walking around wearing masks and gloves because they are afraid of getting sick.

Those were the days. I sure miss it; the normalcy of being a college student. Especially one that is set to graduate this year and have their last spring quarter in college. I guess for now all I have is this game, of what would have been...

To play through the game, just follow the instructions on the screen. The keys that need to be pressed to move forward are highlighted in purple, so pay attention to which keys need to be pressed next. There are a few different choices to make in this game so make sure you read carefully, because either can change the way your day goes.
